metadata.title: CVE-2020-5398 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Spring Framework, versions 5.2.x prior to 5.2.3, versions 5.1.x prior to5.1.13, and versions 5.0.x prior to 5.0.16, an application is vulnerable toa reflected file download (RFD) attack when it sets a "Content-Disposition"header in the response where the filename attribute is derived from usersupplied input.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
